original_text: I rejoice at the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus, because they have made up for your absence,
korean_text: 내가 스데바나와 브드나도와 아가이고가 온 것을 기뻐하노니 그들이 너희의 부족한 것을 채웠음이라

sentences.original_text: I rejoice at the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus
because they have made up for your absence
